name: Project Mysteria
description:
This game is a love letter mainly to Bandai Namco's Tales of series, but there are other franchises involved as well.

Introduction

Coming back home from yet another monster extermination a girl notices an unconscious man in the middle of the forest. He remembers nothing except his name. Searching for answers he sets out into the unknown.

Characters

  • Noel
    A mysterious young man found in the forest. He only knows his name, but is determined to learn who he really is.
  • Kaoris
    A villager of a forest village skilled in baton combat. She exterminates monsters, keeping her village safe, but a chance meeting with a stranger results in an expected opportunity.

Features

  • Active Combat
    Fight deadly opponents while using classic and new artes in an active time battle! Gauges don't charge while you're selecting combat so you don't have to stress when selecting artes.
  • Skits
    A plethora of short, portrait-based conversation between your party members! Laughter guaranteed! ;)
  • Dual Language
    A true rarity among RPG Maker games! Project Mysteria features English (main) and Polish as possible language options.
